tasks.text: Provision VPC with public/private subnets across 2 AZs
what: Design a VPC with public and private subnets across 2 availability zones.
Set routing so public subnets reach the internet, and private subnets reach the internet via NAT.
Define security groups with minimal inbound access and clear intent.
decisions: Single NAT (cheaper) vs one NAT per AZ (more resilient).
doneWhen: You can explain the traffic path from “internet → load balancer → nodes → pods” on a diagram.
Instances/pods in private subnets can reach the internet (for updates/pulling images) without being publicly reachable.
avoid: Putting worker nodes in public subnets unless you have a strong reason.
Overly permissive 0.0.0.0/0 inbound rules.
